Package org.catlady.server.game.card

Class GenericCard

java.lang.Object
org.catlady.server.game.card.GenericCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
CatCard, CatnipCard, CostumeCard, FoodCard, LostCatCard, SprayBottleCard, ToyCard
public class GenericCard extends Object implements Card
A generic card that can be extended to add specific characteristic.

    • GenericCard

      protected GenericCard(int numberOfPlayersRequired, CardType cardType, String cardName)
      Constructor for creating a card.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayersRequired - the number of players required to use this card in the game.
      cardType - the card type.
      cardName - the unique name of the card.
